title: JustLooking 2.0.2 (Image Viewer for Mac OS X)
description:
I&#039;m pleased to announce the immediate availablity of JustLooking 2.0. JustLooking is a program to view pictures and images on your Mac OS X (Tiger) based computer. JustLooking is and will always be very free.

Version 2.0.2 fixes the arrow key navigation bug many users have seen as well as adds support for:

* Portuguese
* Traditional Chinese (Mandarin)

Version 2.0.l added support for:

* Simplified Chinese
* Swedish
* Norwegian

as well as fixes to French, German, and Italian.  


New for Version 2.0:

    * Based on the suggestions and feedback from some users, I have completely redesigned and rewritten the user interface for JustLooking, implementing the smoked-black look that a lot of applications are moving towards in Leopard.
    * Image resizing has been made significantly faster and less memory intensive. Image rendering is also much quicker.
    * There is now remote control support in slide show mode:
          o nex
